## BaseClient.sendData() method

Send data (binary or text)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
sendData(data: Uint8Array | string | object, options: TransportOptions, serviceId: number, pendingApiItem?: PendingApiItem): Promise<{
        err?: TsrpcError;
    }>;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |

## Remarks

Long connection: wait res by listenning `conn.onmessage` Short connection: wait res by waitting response
